body:
Thanks for the feedback! If your issue is related to the Flutter framework itself,
please open an issue at
[github.com/flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/new).

## Steps to Reproduce

I opened a project.  Error happens on project load, but project loads and seems ok.

Exception
null

com.intellij.openapi.util.TraceableDisposable$DisposalException: Editor is already disposed

comment_data.body: Thanks for taking the time to file an issue. We've already fixed this problem, in #6264.

title: Exception on project load
